text.agreement: By continuing, you agree to the <privacy >privacy policy</privacy > and <cookie >cookie policy</cookie >, and accept <terms>the terms of the license agreement</terms>.
text.codeRequirements: Please check your email and enter the verification code above
text.emailRequirements: Please enter a valid email address. A verification code will be sent to this address
text.loginLength: Login must be at least 6 characters long
text.loginRequirements: Account name must contain at least 6 characters and include both letters and numbers
text.loginSymbols: Account name may contain only Latin letters and numbers.
text.passwordLatin: Only Latin letters and digits are allowed
text.passwordLength: Must must contain at least 8 characters
text.passwordLowerCase: Must contain at least one lowercase letter
text.passwordNumber: Must contain at least one digit
text.passwordRequirements: Must contain 8 characters, lowercase and uppercase Latin letters, and numbers
text.passwordUpperCase: Must contain at least one uppercase letter
text.recoverRequirements: Please enter your account email address. A recover code will be sent to confirm this address.

codeInput.sentTo: A code has been sent to

Improve your development skills by training on code tasks that

continously challenge and push your coding practice
